title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 11.17 - Forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 11.17 - Forms

State Regulations

All forms are available on the Department of Law's website at
https://ag.ny.gov/forms. (a) Form ADV. Uniform Application f or Investment Adviser Registration, parts 1 and
2. (b) Form ADV-H. Application for Temporary or Continuing Hardship

Exemption. (c) Form ADV-W. Notice of Withdrawal From Registration as Investment

Adviser. (d) Form NY-IAQ. New York Investment Adviser Qualification. (Retired). (e) Form U4. Uniform Application f or Securities Industry Registration or

Transfer. (f) Form U5. Uniform Termination Notice for Securities Industry

Registration. (g) Form NY-IASW. New York Special Waiver Qualification Under 13 NYCRR
11.7
(b). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. &
Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
11.17

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

Amended

New York State Register December 2, 2020/Volume
XLII, Issue 48, eff. 2/2/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
